# This file is autogenerated
title: submitOtpCode
description: Overview of the submitOtpCode method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/signer/classes/AuthClient/submitOtpCode
---

Submits an OTP code for verification and completes the authentication process.
This method should be called after sendEmailOtp() with the code received via email.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Usage

```ts twoslash
// First send OTP
await authClient.sendEmailOtp({ email: "user@example.com" });

// Then submit the code received via email
const authSession = await authClient.submitOtpCode({ otpCode: "123456" });
```

## Parameters

### params

`SubmitOtpCodeParams`

- Parameters for submitting the OTP code

### params.otpCode

`string`

- The OTP code received via email

## Returns

`Promise<AuthSession>`
Promise that resolves to an auth session instance
